subject: Attention : Sir,
body:
Attention : Sir,
This is to inform you that the Government of Thailand has approved mandatory release of all pending funds to be released immediately to all approved beneficiaries due to the Covid-19 world pandemic.
This notice also includes your uncompleted transaction few years ago and upon receipt of your reasponse then your fund shall be released immediately to your bank account.  
Note: Please note that all outstanding fees must be paid prior to the release of your fund.
The total approved fund to be released to you is worth US$3.5 Million while your outstanding fee is US$500 for the procurement of required legal documents.
You are advised to reconfirm your bank details.
As soon as I confirm the fee US$500, I shall immediately transfer your fund into your account immediately and forward you the transfer slip.
Kindly send the outstanding fee US$500 through western union or money Gram with the below details
NAME: Pimporn Tareangram
ADDRESS: Soi 35, Bangkapi, Bangkok Thailand 10310
Phone: +66 817477721
Your money will be released immediately upon our confirmation of the fee US$500.
Thank you for your kind understanding, stay safe and be protected.
Yours sincerely,
Mrs. Sujitpan Lamsam
Executive Manager (FFB BANK)
Phone: +66 989-355-269
FFB Bank, Bangkok, Thailand

subject: Re:   Attention : Sir,
body:
Dear Mrs. Sujitpan Lamsam,

Thank you for your email. However, I would like to clarify a few things before proceeding further.

Firstly, could you please provide more details about the fund that is supposed to be released to me? I don't recall having any pending funds in Thailand.

Secondly, you mentioned a fee of US dollars but did not specify the exact amount. Could you please clarify this?

Lastly, could you provide more information about the legal documents that are required?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Ronald
